title: History Extra podcast - March 2009 - Part 2
itunes:title: History Extra podcast - March 2009 - Part 2
itunes:subtitle: Marc Morris discusses how Edward I appropriated the legend of King Arthur, Peter Hart reflects on the dangerous careers of First World War fighter pilots.
description:
Marc Morris discusses how Edward I appropriated the legend of King Arthur, Peter Hart reflects on the dangerous careers of First World War fighter pilots.
